description: Searches the web for the latest AI tool releases, updates, and news across categories (Productivity & Workflow, Creative & Design, Development & Coding, Business & Analytics, Research & Learning). Compiles a structured categorized daily digest.

example_response.digest_date: The date of the digest in YYYY-MM-DD format

tools.name: Name of the AI tool
tools.url: URL to learn more about the tool

example_response.summary: A brief 2-3 sentence summary of today's key highlights
